平平凡凡: (へいへいぼんぼん) - (yoji) very ordinary; mediocre; all-too-common; quite commonplace
平年: (へいねん) - non-leap year; normal year (esp. as pertains to weather patterns, vegetative growth, harvest yields, etc.)
平年並み: (へいねんなみ) - average year; normal year
平年寄り: (ひらどしより) - {sumo} coach without a special assignment within the Sumo Association
平底船: (ひらそこぶね) - flat-bottomed boat; scow
平成: (heisei) - Heisei era (8 de janeiro de 1989 - 30 de abril de 2019)
平手: (ひらて) - palm/open hand; equality/lack of handicap (e.g. in a game)
平打ち: (ひらうち) - blow striking with the flat of the sword; to slap; metal flattened by striking; tape/flat braid; type of flat ornamental hairpin made of silver and inscribed with a clan's crest or patterns of birds and flowers
平撞木鮫: (ヒラシュモクザメ) - great hammerhead (Sphyrna mokarran, the largest species of hammerhead shark)
平政: (ヒラマサ) - yellowtail amberjack (species of fish, Seriola lalandi)
平文: (ひらぶん) - plain text/unciphered text; divided equally
平方キロメートル: (へいほうキロメートル) - square kilometer; square kilometre
平方メートル: (へいほうメートル) - square metre
平方根機能: (へいほうこんきのう) - square root function
平日: (ひらび) - weekday/ordinary days (i.e. non-holiday); (ひらび only) kanji radical 73
平明達意: (へいめいたつい) - (yoji) plain and lucid; articulate
平易明快: (へいいめいかい) - (yoji) simple and clear; plain and lucid
平曲: (へいきょく) - chanting of the Heike Monogatari to biwa accompaniment
平更: (ひらさら) - earnestly/intently/determinedly/by all means; ... the heck (e.g. "what the heck?")/... in the world (e.g. "why in the world?")/... on earth (e.g. "who on earth?")
平服: (へいふく) - ordinary clothes; everyday attire; plain clothes; civilian clothes
平板: (へいばん) - slab; flat board; monotony; lithography
平板動物目: (へいばんどうぶつもく) - Tricoplaciformes; order of multicellular invertebrates
平板動物綱: (へいばんどうぶつこう) - Tricoplacia; class of multicellular invertebrates
平板動物門: (へいばんどうぶつもん) - Placozoa; phylum of multicellular invertebrates
平板型: (へいばんがた) - pattern of Japanese accent with the last mora high and the succeeding particle also high
平板測量: (へいばんそくりょう) - plane-table surveying
平気で: (へいきで) - without compunction; coolly; without batting an eyelid; unscrupulously; nonchalantly; remorselessly; without hesitation
平気の平左: (へいきのへいざ) - quite unconcerned; nonchalant
平水: (へいすい) - calm water/smooth water; the usual amount of water
平水夫: (へいすいふ) - foremast hand; common sailor
平沙万里: (へいさばんり) - (yoji) vast stretch of desert; vast expanse of sandy plain
平準化: (へいじゅんか) - leveling; levelling; equalization; alleviation (e.g. of unemployment); harmonization
平滑: (へいかつ) - smooth; even; level; flat
平然: (へいぜん) - calm; composed; cool; quiet
平目: (ヒラメ) - flounder (esp. the large-tooth flounders of family Paralichthyidae, but also lefteye flounders of family Bothidae); bastard halibut/olive flounder (Paralichthys olivaceus)
平社員: (ひらしゃいん) - rank and file member of staff; ordinary employee; low-grade employee
平積み: (ひらづみ) - flat display; stacking something flat (e.g. lying on its side, faceup)
平穏無事: (へいおんぶじ) - (yoji) tranquillity and peace; tranquility and peace; peaceful and uneventful
平等主義: (びょうどうしゅぎ) - principle of equality
平等権: (びょうどうけん) - right of equality
平等観: (びょうどうかん) - viewing all things as undifferentiated and equal/non-discriminative thought; contemplation of the equality of all things from the standpoint of emptiness
平素: (へいそ) - ordinary; in the past; usual; regular
平素は: (へいそは) - usually; ordinarily; in the past
平織: (ひらおり) - plain fabrics; plain weave
平織り: (ひらおり) - plain fabrics; plain weave
平置き: (ひらおき) - horizontally mounted; horizontally parked; placed flat; lay-flat
平臥: (へいが) - lying down; being laid up
平臼: (ひらうす) - horizontal stone hand mill
平草: (ヒラクサ) - Ptilophora subcostata (species of red alga)
平虫: (ヒラムシ) - flatworm/flat worm; flat bark beetle
